title: NA Speaker condoles with Razzaq Bhatti
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed deep sorrow over the passing of the father-in-law of Razzaq Mehmood Bhatti, Joint Editor of Kashmir Express and Vice President of RIUJ (Dastoor).
In his condolence message, the Speaker offered prayers for the departed soul and extended heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved family.
“Those associated with the field of journalism share a common bond of grief in such moments,” said the Speaker, emphasizing solidarity with the journalist community.
“In this hour of sorrow, I stand with Razzaq Bhatti and his family in their grief,” he added.
The Speaker prayed to Almighty Allah for the elevation of the deceased’s ranks and for granting patience and strength to the bereaved family.
